SkillRequirement.name: SkillRequirement
SkillRequirement.description: Represents a skill that is required to complete a particular task in Salesforce Scheduler. Skill requirements can be added to work types Salesforce Scheduler.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record can only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

RelatedRecordId.description: The record that the skill is required for. The related record can be a work type.

SkillLevel.description: The level of the skill required. Skill levels can range from zero to 99.99. Depending on your business needs, you can want the skill level to reflect years of experience, certification levels, or license classes.

SkillNumber.description: An auto-generated number identifying the skill requirement.
